abstract: Raising the stakes in a contentious Silicon Valley bidding war, EMC said Monday it increased its bid for Data Domain to $33.50 per share in cash in hopes of snatching the company from NetApp.
snippet: Raising the stakes in a contentious Silicon Valley bidding war, EMC said Monday it increased its bid for Data Domain to $33.50 per share in cash in hopes of snatching the company from NetApp.
lead_paragraph: Raising the stakes in a technology takeover feud, EMC said Monday it increased its bid for Data Domain to $33.50 a share in cash in the hopes of snatching the company from NetApp.

headline.main: EMC Ups the Ante for Data Domain
